# gameCenterDelegate

**Instance Property**

The view controller’s delegate.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var gameCenterDelegate: (any GKGameCenterControllerDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Before presenting the view controller, your game must set a delegate.

## Setting the view controller delegate

- **GKGameCenterControllerDelegate**: The delegate that GameKit calls when the player dismisses the dashboard.
